html:
6.22.22  3:56 pm   What is your favorite note in the English language?

      um,

6.22.22  3:54 pm   Did you solve the Reimann hypothesis?

      not yet

6.22.22  3:21 pm   how do you feel about pig latin?

      almost identical to actual latin

6.22.22  2:12 pm   Do you think octopi would be swell drummers?

     no

     Eight arms to hold eight drumsticks, right?

      number of arms does not correlate to drumming quality

6.22.22  1:59 pm   is it a joyous and momentous experience when you're picking out a new song or is it more a chore?

     not a chore. it's so momentous it can be absolutely terrifying

      and do you ever regret picking out a song or feel like you can't take it anywhere (like writer's block or something) and you get stuck?

     i get tremendous fear just before finalizing the selection. and i also tend to get some waves of remorse within the next 12 hours after selection. but as long as i'm confident in the selection process and do it correctly, i can be sure that it's correct. it also helps if i do a bit of writing on each one of the finalists (BEFORE the final selection) to bump each one of them up to the point where they are irresistible, then my only regret would be what i DIDN'T get to pick

     thanks and i really liked the new song

6.22.22  1:15 pm   opinion on france?

      the D roads won't tell you what region you're in

6.22.22  12:38 pm   do you believe in gravity?

      yes

6.22.22  12:32 pm   how to disagree peacefully

      breathe, at your own pace

6.22.22  12:32 pm   have you ever considered being a small gamer for a fraction of the time

      yes

6.22.22  11:03 am   How do you want something enough to work to achieve it? If I could just have the desire to achieve my dream I would be quite happy I think.

      if you don't want it that much, then it probably won't bother you if you don't get it. on the other hand, if it starts to bother you more (not getting it), then that will push you towards getting it

6.22.22  10:43 am   i really appreciate your choice to turn your green screen grey in the first part of ground plane

      i've been doing that for the past 9 videos or so

6.22.22  10:35 am   Are you actually afraid of going up in a plane?

      no

6.22.22  10:34 am   is montana real

      yes but it's far away. even if you're there. it's far away from itself

6.22.22  10:09 am   how do I know if I'm alive

      because you are asking a question. asking questions is exactly what alive people do

6.22.22  9:08 am   What is one color that you can take responsibility for making popular again?

      black and white

6.22.22  9:05 am   How far does one have to go to find out what is the meaning of life?

      you can find it at any distance

6.22.22  9:00 am   what happens if i go higher than the pilgrims did

      you'll be fine

6.22.22  8:58 am   Could you pass me the salt

      i will send it to you

6.22.22  8:51 am   what's the story behind "hello sexy pants"? it just stands out among your other songs to me for some reason

      i was doing a paper-only writing session, in the library, on october 30, 2010, and i came up something resembling the first 4 bars. On feb 9, 2013, i re-wrote the intro/chorus to be much more like it is today. On may 1, 2018, it was the final selection amongst 8 other semi-finalists including "when i get older i'm gonna be stronger", and 7 others that still haven't been picked (but many of them have made it to the finals several times since). Then, i wrote and produced it according to my standard writing/production practices. i also bought a greenscreen around this time, because i was tired seeing all the household objects in the background

6.22.22  7:59 am   thoughts on the socio-economic state of the world?

      i'm not good at accurately measuring that state, for the entire world

6.22.22  7:24 am   is the happiness you proclaim in "the ground plane" genuine?

     yes, but that's not the reason it's there. it turns out to be genuine, because it makes me happy whenever i get the songwriting results i like. up until just before i got that line, i was probably unhappy and nervous that a good line wouldn't come. but what the line actually refers to is the happiness that has accumulated in the song contents up to that point

      i feel it is, but many people seem to think you're lying to yourself.

     that may be because that whole section is squarely fixated in a minor key. which adds to the irony there, fueling my actual happiness

6.22.22  6:56 am   would you consider the following: breadstick

      sure

6.22.22  6:42 am   favorite george harrison moment?

      any time he says the word 'there'

6.22.22  5:30 am   Why do i keep looking for a catalyst to start my healing journey instead of just starting it

      the longer you wait, the more you will want it

6.22.22  3:53 am   How do you feel about tier lists?

      some are better than others

6.22.22  3:46 am   What's the scariest thing for you?

      nothing

6.22.22  3:34 am   is the "got my ticket" prelude melody from "the ground plane" video part of the song or is it its own separate song

      neither. it's part of the video, but i don't consider it a stand-alone song, nor part of the ground plane song

6.22.22  3:30 am   what came first the chicken or the egg

      neither one is here yet

6.22.22  2:49 am   What's your fav movie?

      still haven't found one i really like

6.22.22  2:17 am   what year is it

      must be in the billions

6.22.22  1:28 am   thoughts on lamps?

      get one that turns on. more expensive, but it's worth it

6.22.22  1:19 am   what's your favorite word to misspell

      plam trees

6.22.22  1:10 am   What are your opinions on Bitcoin?

      it's just so....... tangible

6.22.22  12:17 am   why dont you like going up

      i do. i like every direction. i'm a fan of directions

6.22.22  12:04 am   I have a turing test tomorrow and im really nervous about it. You got any tips?

      answer C

6.21.22  11:29 pm   Does power actually corrupt, or does it amplify existing immoral tendencies?

      sounds about the same to me

6.21.22  10:39 pm   who is the best pony

      all ponys are the same

6.21.22  10:32 pm   favorite non-visible color?

      clear

6.21.22  10:18 pm   are seagulls a type of bagel or are bagels a type of seagull

      they are mutually exclusive

6.21.22  10:06 pm   Is it weird to eat sour cream by itself?

      i was going to say no but now that i think about it yes

6.21.22  9:30 pm   is "why is everything so dumb and stupid" a question that is philosophical in nature? 

      it's more spiritual/emotional

6.21.22  9:28 pm   You want a challenge? Solve the Reimann hypothesis

      i'll give it a try

6.21.22  9:22 pm   Do you wear thigh highs?

      waist highs

6.21.22  9:05 pm   Do we live in a simulation?

      of what

6.21.22  9:04 pm   And the day goes on consistently references running and escape in music video and song. what were you running from

      the moment just before the song, before the song was written. i was running away from the song not being written.

6.21.22  8:48 pm   Are fax machines facts machines?

      i've only ever received one fax, and it was a hoax

6.21.22  8:45 pm   Am I cool?

      you can be, if you want to

6.21.22  8:39 pm   how much singing needs to be in a video for it to be a song video

      it's not the amount of singing. it's the number of songs. and for a song video that number is supposed to be 1

6.21.22  8:27 pm   what is something you've never told anybody?

      i can't tell you

6.21.22  8:25 pm   where did you get the idea for ground plane? shower thoughts?

      someone asked me what the title of the next song would be, and i didn't know yet, so i made something up. that is where the title came from. the rest of the song was written based on the title
